page.title: 14Life in Brock' 1
page.content: Of the residents of the village who agreed to participate in our small survey some interesting facts emerge. Of the {36}people talked to all of them enjoyed living in the village and they all complimented the outstanding natural beauty of the area. {29}of the households had at least one garage and only{7}hoses had no garage at all. We asked each of the householders how many people lived in their house:- {3}people lived on their own. {12}people lived with one other person. {3}people had 2 others living in the house. {13}people lived in families of 4. {7}people had families of 5. {1}person lived with 5 other people.
